A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The dialog was abysmal and the Star Wars Galaxy lore/how-everything-works seems to have been thrown to the wayside. As a long time Star Wars fan\, I felt that this movie was a commercialization sell out on behalf of Disney. I was left cringing multiple times at the dialog and ludicrous action scenes. My personal opinion is that this rivals The Phantom Menace as possibly the worst addition to the series.
